message: Let's divide fairly, I take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's be a bit more realistic. This offer won't be as good next round!
Come on, let's meet in the middle
Okay, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is fair. Take it or leave it, but it won't get better for you.
You're getting desperate, I can see
This is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit from inflation, and you're being stubborn.  52 is the best you'll get - take it before it shrinks even more!
Inflation is killing your share, give up already
